doctor.name: Dr. Anwar Hossain Bablu
doctor.specialty: Brain, Nerve, Spine, Stroke & Neuromedicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Anwar Hossain Bablu is a Neuromedicine Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Neurology). He is a Assistant Professor, Neuromedicine at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Anwar Hossain Bablu at Medinova Medical Services, Barisal is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Kazi M. Monirul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Kazi M. Monirul Islam is a Neuromedicine Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Neuromedicine). He is a Consultant (Neuromedicine) at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Kazi M. Monirul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Muhammad Masudur Rahman is a Neurologist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Neurology). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurology at Sheikh Sayera Khatun Medical College, Gopalganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Muhammad Masudur Rahman at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal is 7pm to 9pm (Only Thursday).
